identity.name: OTCwise
design_principles: Fusion: Botanical Encyclopedia meets Modern Safety Manual
Content is King: Legibility is safety
Negative Space: Breathing room for anxious users

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Marketing, Mode B for Dashboard)

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: rounded-full bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300
buttons.outline: rounded-full border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 transition-all duration-300

cards.default: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-2xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.interactive: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-2xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer
cards.glass: bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-lg rounded-2xl

inputs.default: rounded-xl border-border bg-white/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all duration-200

visual_enhancers.texture: Subtle grain overlay on backgrounds to reduce digital flatness
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows (colored with primary hue) rather than harsh black shadows
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used sparingly for sticky headers and floating action buttons
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone or Regular) - Soft and rounded

hero.alt: Calm doctor consultation with warm lighting

first_aid.alt: First aid kit supplies flat lay

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Modern Apothecary' theme using the specified colors and fonts.
Use 'Merriweather' for all H1-H3 headings and 'Manrope' for body text.
Ensure the 'Sage Green' primary color is dominant but not overwhelming.
Use 'Clay/Terracotta' for alerts/warnings instead of standard red.
Apply generous spacing (p-8, p-12) to create a calm atmosphere.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Prioritize accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met, especially with the soft color palette.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Do not apply universal transitions (transition: all).
Do not center align the app container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Add subtle grain textures and noise overlays.
